title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Health) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister health) order 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Susan Mitchell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Susan Mitchell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, Block 1, Miesian Plaza, 50-58 Lower 
Baggot Street, Dublin 2, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for 
Health with effect from 23 July 2020.
text_norm: 2 susan mitchell particular whose address deposited office department health block 1 miesian plaza 50-58 lower baggot street dublin 2 appointed special adviser minister health effect 23 july 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Colette Sexton, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Colette Sexton, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, Block 1, Miesian Plaza, 50-58 Lower 
Baggot Street, Dublin 2, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for 
Health with effect from 17 August 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 
22 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [383] 3
text_norm: 3 colette sexton particular whose address deposited office department health block 1 miesian plaza 50-58 lower baggot street dublin 2 appointed special adviser minister health effect 17 august 2020 given official seal government 22 september 2020 micheal martin taoiseach notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 2nd october 2020 383 3

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The purpose of this Order is to appoint two Special Advisers to the Minister for 
Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [383]
